title: The Psalmes of David translated into lyrick-verse, according to the scope, of the original. And illustrated, with a short argument, and a briefe prayer, or meditation; before, & after, every Psalme. By George Wither
author: Wither, George, 1588-1667.
publisher: Imprinted in the Neatherlands by Cornelis Gerritis van Breughel,
